::Hot Rod::

He wrapped both arms around Unitrons kicking leg, holding it in place.
He xtended his own kick for Unitron's exposed area.
"Stole? No. I took it back from Galvatron. He stole it from Magnus. And
I was chosen. The power will only work with a select few, and I am one
of them. The second I ripped it from Galvatrons neck, the power rushed
over me."
